plot: Conchita, a sixty year-old widow, dreams that she's about to die and must tell someone about her dream before nightfall, or else the dream will become true. Thus, all the day, she looks for somebody who will listen to her.
title: Malos presagios
plot_es: Conchita, a sixty year-old widow, dreams that she's about to die and must tell someone about her dream before nightfall, or else the dream will become true. Thus, all the day, she looks for somebody who will listen to her.
plot_en: Conchita, a sixty year-old widow, dreams that she's about to die and must tell someone about her dream before nightfall, or else the dream will become true. Thus, all the day, she looks for somebody who will listen to her.
